  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/807</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/807</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Aquest any, física: Forces sobre la lluna</string>
            <string language="en">Forces on the Moon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte auf dem Mond</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces sur la lune</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças na lua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze sulla luna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις στο φεγγάρι</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Fitxa de la col.lecció "Aquest any, física!"
que proposa un experiment per reflexionar sobre la força que la Terra fa sobre la Lluna. La fitxa conté imatges, el guió de la pràctica i qüestions amb resposta sobre l'experiment i la interacció Terra-Lluna.</string>
            <string language="en">One of the 'activity cards' in the collection "This year, Physics!" This one is an experiment on the force the Earth exerts on the Moon. The 'card' includes images, instructions for the experiment, and questions and answers on the experiment and the Earth-Moon interaction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mecànica (física)</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics (physics)</string>
            <string language="es">mecánica (física)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen físic</string>
            <string language="en">physical phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">física</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
            <string language="es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine der ' Aktivität Karten in der Ansammlung 
"dieses Jahr, Physik!" Dieses ist ein Experiment auf der Kraft, 
welche die Masse auf dem Mond anwendet. Die ' Karte ' schließt 
Bilder, Anweisungen für das Experiment und Fragen und Antworten auf 
dem Experiment und der Masse-Mond Interaktion ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une des 'cartes d'activité dans la collection 
"cette année, physique!" Celui-ci est une expérience sur la 
force que la terre exerce sur la lune. La 'carte 'inclut des 
images, des instructions pour l'expérience, et des questions et des 
réponses sur l'expérience et l'interaction de Terre-Lune.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um ' dos cartões da atividade na coleção "este
ano, física!" Este é uma experiência na força que a terra 
exerce na lua. ' o cartão ' inclui imagens, instruções para a
experiência, e perguntas e respostas na experiência e na interação
da Terra-Lua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una 'delle schedi di attività nell'accumulazione
"questo anno, fisica!" Questo è un esperimento sulla forza che 
la terra impiega sulla luna. 'la scheda 'include le immagini, 
istruzioni per l'esperimento e domande e risposte sull'esperimento e 
sull'interazione della Terra-Luna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια από τις "κάρτες δραστηριότητασ" στη συλλογή "αυτό
το έτος, φυσική!" Αυτό είναι ένα πείραμα στη δύναμη που η
γη ασκεί στο φεγγάρι. Η "κάρτα" περιλαμβάνει τις εικόνες, 
τις οδηγίες για το πείραμα, και τις ερωταποκρίσεις στο πείραμα και
την αλληλεπίδραση γη-φεγγαριών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker (Physik)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">körperliches Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique (physique)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomène physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos (física)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici (fisica)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fenomeno fisico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί (φυσική)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσικό φαινόμενο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
